posts.post_content:
Some great black/red combos.  
  
1. [Duress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Duress) to see what they've got  
2. [Thought Hemorrhage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thought Hemorrhage) to brutally rip the best stuff out of their hand  
3. [Blightning](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blightning) on the next turn for further hand-rape  
4. Savor the sweet card advantage  
5. ???  
6. Profit!

Posted By: U-caster (1/5/2010 1:26:48 PM)
Rating:

@Etregan: how about having them NOT play it on you?

Even if they don't get rid of anything they get to see your hand which is very handy. For example, a common matchup - Jund V Vampires. Game 1, Vampie player duresses the Jund player and sees that they have creatures and land, one of which is a Great Sable Stag. Vampire player now knows to hold back his Gatekeeper for the Stag and remove the other creatures with other spells. That's pretty handy information.

Whilst game 2 and 3 of this matchup the vamp players should already be aware that the Jund player would have Sable Stags, knowing it game 1 could set up the crucial first win.
